This is the home of the CDS Risk Hackathon taking place Fall 2022 (HS22).

The project consists of a hackathon that utilizes data from the scientific outputs of Unibas researchers. More information about the [hackathon](hackathon.html) and the associated [data](data.html) will be updated in the respective pages. The results of the hackathon will be made available in the [report](report.html).

Interested? Send us an email at [cds-psych@unibas.ch](mailto:cds-psych@unibas.ch)!
